data.actual_result: The dictionary/ spell suggestions do not appear
data.expected_result: The dictionary/spell suggestions should appear (just like if you where using the paperclip in discord and or uploading to another app like notes)
data.short_description: The dictionary/ spell suggestions don’t show when upload something using the share extension
data.steps_to_repro: - First find a server you want to post a picture or video in - Go to pictures, find a picture or video and use the upload arrow (box with arrow pointing up) and select discord  - Now click in the square and wait for the keyboard to appear
